attributes.action: stop paying bonuses to government pen pushers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop paying bonuses to pen pushers and put what money that is saved back in to the departments that save it to make life better for the forces.old and sick,stop cutting back and get better deal for ower pound spent if people are saving money sack the person who is wasting it make people more responsible for there budgets.We pay them to do a job if they cant do it sack them no golden had shake just sack them.
